text: [Music] foreign [Music] program is based on agreements for sustainable agricultural practices so on one side the farm commits to series of management practices that benefit nature and on the other side of the agreement government in recognition of this commitment that benefits society as a whole will help the farmers in various ways one of our lines of action is providing training and consulting services on sustainable Farm practices and farm management we know that education is a motive for change but we also know that farmers and land workers are extremely busy so we try and choose topics of special interests such as those that are around increasing agricultural productivity and reducing production costs aware of the implications of working in agriculture and livestock we organize training sessions during one or two days where farmers can pick and choose the workshops of Interest so they don't have to attend all of the sessions we tried to organize training when there is lease workload in the agricultural sector and we always prioritize an informal space and time where producers Educators and other stakeholders can chat with each other and exchange valuable experiences one of the activities that we organize is the Agriculture and environment seminar you could say that we have been organizing it historically because we have already organized 15 editions it is an annual event where we share inspiring stories from within the agricultural sector the key point is that the speakers share their direct life experience so they share their success but also the mistakes they have made and the lessons that they have learned from it we also organized technical workshops that include theory and practice in the same day they cover various topics such as natural pest control soil fertility directed grazing or wind manures during these workshops we go into the detail on how to implement the practices shown on the farms finally a point we believe is key when it comes to moving from Theory to practice is accompanying the farmer in their first steps when implementing these new practices this is why we have invested in personal post Workshop consultations on farms basically from the participants those firms who decide to implement the learn practice can opt into an accompanying consultation that can help them put it into action and resolve any questions when they pop up during this process this would conclude the short summary of activities we do in training and Consulting work in custadia this is just one of the routes we take as we also take action by providing services and materials Product Promotion and also working with the general public through volunteering and Environmental Education and other activities that we will explain in the following videos foreign [Music]

program is based on agreements for
sustainable agricultural practices so on
one side the farm commits to series of
management practices that benefit nature
and on the other side of the agreement
government in recognition of this
commitment that benefits society as a

ways one of our lines of action is
providing training and consulting
services on sustainable Farm practices
and farm management
we know that education is a motive for
change but we also know that farmers and
land workers are extremely busy so we
try and choose topics of special
interests such as those that are around
increasing agricultural productivity and
reducing production costs

where farmers can pick and choose the

to attend all of the sessions

Educators and other stakeholders can

it

they cover various topics such as
